summary: Skimpy armor set made from meat items. Craftable under misc catagory at a cooking pot. Improvable at a workbench.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Fleisk Korpenpanzer
Author: Edhildil
01,26,2015
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

Skimpy armor set made from meat items.

Craftable under misc category at a cooking pot.

Improvable at a workbench.

Non BBP on purpose; the breast coned out when I weighted this to BBP and it didnt look correct.

The armor uses vanilla meat textures. The body uses CBBE textures.  Body shape designed after my Oblivion DMRA mods.

The world model for the armor pieces looks like meat, and acts like meat, except you can't cook it.
 
Pieces:        Cooking pot craft misc item:

Armor          Beef Meat, Dog Meat, Goat Meat, Venison.
Gloves         Beef Meat
Boots          Beef Meat
Mask           Beef Meat

Temper all with Beef Meat at the workbench.

mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

If someone wants to convert this to Bodyslide 2 or another body type go for it.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)


 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_fleiskpanzer folder

Delete Edhildils fleisk korpenpanzer Armor esp. file


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil for the armor
BB Drac for the mask mesh
 

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
